body:
Well, I ended up circling back around to what I had earlier, which was just targeting the internal `Select` component and testing that its `onChange` bubbled up through to the `ExtensionSelect` prop.

I'm still not in love with this, but I think it's close enough to land this PR. Other ExtensionSelect work needs to be done in the future, so we can touch on the tests again then.
